Parameters.description: Parameters for the DRINK_FROM operation. Consumes a single serving from a liquid container, tracking volume and managing empty state transitions.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor drinking from the container

containerEntity.description: Entity ID of the liquid container being consumed from

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string, volumeConsumed?: number, flavorText?: string}
